document_data.name: Joseph
document_data.mainbody: '''Joseph''' was a [[human]] from [[Faer√ªn]] who stowed away on a ship headed for [[Maztica]].
document_data.Description: Joseph was a light-skinned man with flowing, blonde hair. He wore light brown pants and a ragged, blue shirt. The ensemble was tied together with a black sword belt.
document_data.Personality: Possessed of a cheerful attitude, Joseph was intent on proving to the world that he was the best at everything. This conviction manifested itself more as enthusiasm rather than arrogance.
document_data.Possessions: He owned a magical [[short sword]] and a ''[[ring of feather falling]]'', in addition to a ''[[potion of healing]]'' and a mundane [[trident]].
document_data.History: Hoping to explore the world, Joseph absconded from his uncle and stowed away on a ship bound for Maztica. When eventually discovered, he was thrown overboard and washed up on an island. On this island, he met the local Maztican tribesman [[Swendi]]{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1991|559|Swendi}} and cooperated with him to take down a [[pteranodon]].
